bibl.title: A Possibly Unique Isis Head Bronze Coin of Cleopatra I (180-176 BC).
bibl.note: Unrecorded Ptolemaic bronze coin recently appeared on the market. - Ptolemaic Isis head bronze coins. - Characteristics of Isis. - Dating / Attribution of ISIS + QC and other Isis head bronze coins. - Cleopatra I as Isis. - Coin Portraits of Cleopatra I. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Richard Pincock, A Possibly Unique Isis Head Bronze Coin of Cleopatra I (180-176 BC).

Unrecorded Ptolemaic bronze coin recently appeared on the market. - Ptolemaic Isis head bronze coins. - Characteristics of Isis. - Dating / Attribution of ISIS + QC and other Isis head bronze coins. - Cleopatra I as Isis. - Coin Portraits of Cleopatra I. - Avec résumé en anglais.
